sentences.en: a ban on the ivory trade

sentences.cn: 生活在象牙塔中的学者

sentences.en: Each piece is unique, an exquisite painting of a real person, done on ivory.
sentences.cn: 每一件艺术品都是绘在象牙上的精美绝伦的真人肖像，都是独一无二的。

sentences.en: He showed him how to blow into the ivory mouthpiece.
sentences.cn: 他给他演示如何吹奏象牙吹口乐器。

sentences.en: He sports an ivory - handled cane these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天来,他一直在炫耀一只象牙柄手杖.

sentences.en: It's a very emotional issue. How can you advocate selling the ivory from elephants?
sentences.cn: 这是个很容易激起公愤的话题。你怎么能够鼓吹贩卖象牙？

sentences.en: My grandmother has some jewelry made of ivory.
sentences.cn: 我祖母有一些象牙首饰.

sentences.en: My shirt is more ivory colour than white.
sentences.cn: 我的衬衣与其说是白色的,不如说是乳白色的.

sentences.en: The ivory Buddha carved by Shen Weizhong, a contemporary Chinese sculptor, is the world's smallest piece of sculpture, its size being just four - fifths that of a grain of rice.
sentences.cn: 中国当代雕刻工艺师沈为众雕刻的象牙佛像是世界上最小的雕刻.这个象牙佛像只有一粒米的 五分之四 大.

sentences.en: The Ivory Coast became the world's leading cocoa producer.
sentences.cn: 象牙海岸成为世界上可可粉的主要产地。

sentences.en: The ivory gull often follows polar bears to feed on the remains of seal kills.
sentences.cn: 象牙海鸥经常跟在北极熊的后面吃剩下的海豹尸体.

sentences.en: The panel had a veneer of gold and ivory.
sentences.cn: 这木板上面镶饰了一层金和象牙.

sentences.en: They don't really, in their ivory towers, understand how pernicious drug crime is.
sentences.cn: 他们身处象牙塔中，并不真正了解毒品犯罪的危害有多大。

sentences.en: What exquisite [ delicate ] ivory carvings these are!
sentences.cn: 这几件 象牙 雕刻做得真细!

phrases.tran_cn: n. 象牙塔（指脱离现实生活的小天地）

trans.tran_cn: 象牙，象牙制品，象牙色，象牙质
trans.tran_en: the hard smooth yellowish-white substance from the tusks of an  elephant
